name: Ext_R3_ProcedureRequest_context
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ProcedureRequest.context for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ProcedureRequest.context from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ProcedureRequest|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Encounter or Episode during which request was created
element.definition: An encounter or episode of care that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.encounter` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.encounter`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.encounter` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.encounter`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: Encounter or Episode during which request was created
